citations.narrative:
The back room floor was littered with old bedding and food pellets. The floor needs to be swept/vaccumed to
remove all the old bedding and food pellets that accumualted from cleaning the animal cages. This condition can
lead to a pest problem which can be prevented by a regular program of keeping all areas clean and neat.
Correct by: November 24/2017
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.

narrative:
3.131(c)
SANITATION.   
The back room floor was littered with old bedding and food pellets.  The floor needs to be swept/vaccumed to
remove all the old bedding and food pellets that accumualted from cleaning the animal cages.  This condition can
lead to a pest problem which can be prevented by a regular program of keeping all areas clean and neat.
Correct by:  November 24/2017
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
